languages.text: "Черта с два тебе понравится уготованное будущее, старик. Там, за дверками, уже вовсю передают приветы. Говорят, заждались — тебя и царька твоего".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Черта с два тебе понравится уготованное будущее, старик. Там, за дверками, уже вовсю передают приветы. Говорят, заждались — тебя и царька твоего".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."
languages.original_text: "Черта с два тебе понравится уготованное будущее, старик. Там, за дверками, уже вовсю передают приветы. Говорят, заждались — тебя и царька твоего".

traits.locale_text: "You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."
"You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."
"You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."
"You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."
"You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."
"You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."

languages.text: "Ihr werdet diese Zukunft ganz und gar nicht mögen, alter Mann. Die hinter der Tür lassen bereits grüßen. Sie sagen, sie können es kaum erwarten, Euch und Euren kleinen König zu treffen."
languages.original_text: "You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet diese Zukunft ganz und gar nicht mögen, alter Mann. Die hinter der Tür lassen bereits grüßen. Sie sagen, sie können es kaum erwarten, Euch und Euren kleinen König zu treffen."

languages.text: « Vous n'allez vraiment, vraiment pas apprécier ce futur, mon vieux. Ceux qui se tiennent derrière la porte vous passent déjà le bonjour. Ils disent qu'ils ont hâte de vous rencontrer, vous et votre petit roi. »
languages.original_text: "You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'allez vraiment, vraiment pas apprécier ce futur, mon vieux. Ceux qui se tiennent derrière la porte vous passent déjà le bonjour. Ils disent qu'ils ont hâte de vous rencontrer, vous et votre petit roi. »

languages.text: “像那样的未来，恐怕你真的、真的不会喜欢，老家伙。那些门外的声音已经在问候你们了，它们已经迫不及待想和你，还有你的小国王见面了。”
languages.original_text: "You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."

traits.locale_text: “像那样的未来，恐怕你真的、真的不会喜欢，老家伙。那些门外的声音已经在问候你们了，它们已经迫不及待想和你，还有你的小国王见面了。”

languages.text: «Ese futuro no le gustará en absoluto, anciano. Los que aguardan al otro lado de la puerta ya han enviado sus saludos. Dicen que están deseando conocerle a usted y a su pequeño rey».
languages.original_text: "You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."

traits.locale_text: «Ese futuro no le gustará en absoluto, anciano. Los que aguardan al otro lado de la puerta ya han enviado sus saludos. Dicen que están deseando conocerle a usted y a su pequeño rey».

languages.text: 「その未来は、あなたにとっては本当に、本当に気に入らないものになるわよ、おじいちゃん。扉の向こうの連中からもう挨拶が届いてるよ。あなたと、あなたのちっぽけな王様に会うのが待ちきれないんだって」
languages.original_text: "You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."

traits.locale_text: 「その未来は、あなたにとっては本当に、本当に気に入らないものになるわよ、おじいちゃん。扉の向こうの連中からもう挨拶が届いてるよ。あなたと、あなたのちっぽけな王様に会うのが待ちきれないんだって」

languages.text: "Gerçekten o geleceği beğenmeyeceksin ihtiyar. Kapının ötesindekiler şimdiden selamlarını gönderdi. Seninle ve senin küçük kralınla tanışmak için sabırsızlandıklarını söylüyorlar."
languages.original_text: "You're really, really not going to like that future, old man. The ones beyond the door already send their regards. They say they can't wait to meet you and this little king of yours."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçekten o geleceği beğenmeyeceksin ihtiyar. Kapının ötesindekiler şimdiden selamlarını gönderdiler. Seninle ve senin küçük kralınla tanışmak için sabırsızlandıklarını söylüyorlar."
